EmailTemplate.description: This email template is for advisors to send to students to request that they schedule an advising appointment prior to registering for classes.
EmailTemplate.name: Advising Appointment Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Academic Services Advising Appointment Requested
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
To best support you as you prepare for the upcoming semester, please schedule an Academic Services advising appointment prior to registering for classes. During the appointment, we'll review your academic progress, discuss your current academic plans and anticipated changes, and work together to make sure you're on the best path to achieving academic success at the university.
We look forward to speaking with you soon!
Sincerely,
Academic Services St. Edward's University
